text: Hi Mathieu, my apologies for the late reply - I missed this. I was trying to get an idea of what kind of perfusion system other people were using for this scope in general as I don't have much experience with it. But we have since decided to hold off on it and see what the user base will be like to make a choice down the line. Thank you kindly for your response.
